hotels.title: Exclusive Forster Garden Estate with Outdoor Bath and Private Pool
hotels.description: Let serenity find you at Laurina Estate, a charming retreat in New South Walesâ€™ Mid North Coast. Easily reachable from Port Macquarie or Newcastle, this is the perfect destination for an escape filled with outdoor adventures and good wines. Enjoy exclusive access to the property and its gardens, where your only neighbours are alpacas and nature. Your cosy firepit and outdoor bathhouse with free-standing tub share uninterrupted views of the absolute seclusion day or night.
